thread.section_title: Mercure Paris Montmartre Sacre Coeur - UPDATED 2017 Hotel Reviews & Price Comparison (France) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: What you pay is what you get
thread.title_full: What you pay is what you get - Review of Mercure Paris Montmartre Sacre Coeur, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: Joyce O
title: What you pay is what you get
text: Fantastic location 2 mins from Metro and lots of bars and restaurants. Hotel reception is clean and staff are extremely helpful. Rooms are a more than adequate size and beds comfortable. Breakfast is great value at â‚¬20 (all you can eat) although there are many options on the doorstep. Would definately consider this hotel for any future visits to Paris
